Title: When we grow up we want to go up the mountains and down to the villages
Designer: Fan Jixiang (范继祥)Kong Jianguo (孔建国)Hou Linfu (侯林甫)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The poster on the wall ("What is there to fear with the sun in mind, dare to contribute the spring (of youth) to the people -- Learn from the eleven learned Shanghai youth from Chalinchang, Huangshan, who 'first did not fear hardship, secondly did not fear death'"), by Liu Bairong, represents the famous sacrifice-by-drowning of a group of sent-down Shanghai youth at the Huangshan Tea Forest Farm (Chalinchang, Huangshan). Liu's poster was published previously --in large size-- in 1969.
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)Models and Martyrs
